transArray.content:
The little brother at the front desk is very enthusiastic and will find a way to solve any needs. Room service is also very enthusiastic. The room is small, but comfortable to live in. What I don't like is that the bath and toilet are transparent! !
The transportation location is very convenient. You can walk to Tiananmen Square, the National Museum, Chairman Mao Memorial Hall, and the Forbidden City. It takes only two minutes to walk to the subway, which is very close and convenient. The hotel is on Qianmen Street, convenient for shopping and eating. Beijing needs jiojio for traveling by car or visiting scenic spots, so it is very important to wear a pair of light and comfortable shoes...
